mapper.insert: insert into post values( seq_post_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select p.postNo, p.cateNo, postTitle, postContent, p.regDate, u.userName from post p join category c ON p.cateNo = c.cateNo join users u ON c.id = u.id where c.id = #{id} order by p.postNo DESC fetch first row only
